name: Slashin' Trash
description:
Play as the bravest crab in the ocean, leaping through the water to stop pollution in your home! Careful not to harm other fish while you're at it; stay nimble!

Cute 2D game in which it's your goal to rack up the highest score by destroying the most trash polluting the ocean. Hitting too many other fish will end the game and finalise your score.

Made by a team of 4 for Mini Jam 33: Underwater.

Credentials are also in-game:
